title: How to get profitable Amazon KDP Keywords | Find Unlimited Topics That Sell!

tactics.name: Auto Complete & Keyword Suggestion
tactics.description: Use Amazon's auto-complete feature and keyword suggestion tools to identify trending topics.
steps: Install keyword research tools like AMZ Suggestion Expander
Type niche keywords into Amazon search bar
Niche down by filtering search results
Analyze BSR and review counts for profitability
caveats: Requires manual niching down for accuracy
source_quotes: You have to Niche down the way I'm doing now

tactics.name: Frequently Bought Together
tactics.description: Identify complementary products through Amazon's frequently bought together feature.
steps: Search for existing products in target niche
Check 'Frequently Bought Together' section
Analyze co-purchased products for topic opportunities
Verify profitability through BSR and reviews
caveats: Requires manual verification of product relevance
source_quotes: Any of these books you can open it and go and check whether it is profitable

tactics.name: Amazon Search Validation
tactics.description: Check existing books' review counts and BSR to assess profitability
steps: Search Amazon for a book title
Copy the title and check review counts
Filter results to find topics with <1,000 reviews
Remove subtitles and search again
caveats: May fail for highly saturated niches
source_quotes: you can check how many persons have written on that topic

tactics.name: Author Central Page Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate an author's other works to identify profitable niches
steps: Visit an author's Central Page
Review their published books
Analyze BSR and review data across their titles
source_quotes: look at the books this author have written

tactics.name: ChatGPT Topic Generation
tactics.description: Use AI prompts to generate untapped niche topics
steps: Prompt ChatGPT with niche-specific criteria
Request 50+ low-competition topics
Validate each generated keyword via Amazon search
source_quotes: I need to assist me provide about 50 profitable topics

tactics.name: metric-based topic validation
tactics.description: Evaluate KDP topics using competition, reviews, BSR, niche score, and publisher type
steps: Check competition < 1,000
Verify customer reviews exist
Ensure BSR < 300,000
Confirm niche score > 50
Confirm independent publisher
caveats: Tools like Productor forage may have loading delays
source_quotes: competition has to be less than 1,000

heuristics.name: Low Competition Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize the topic
source_quotes: You have to Niche down the way I'm doing now

heuristics.name: Low-Review Niche Boost
source_quotes: we advise you should get something less than 1,000

heuristics.name: search_volume_opportunity
heuristics.condition: If high search volume with low competition and opportunity score >5, then prioritize
source_quotes: if you have high s volume with low competition... sell like crazy

claims.statement: Niche down reduces competition by filtering search results
source_quotes: You have to Niche down the way I'm doing now

claims.statement: ChatGPT can generate 50+ untapped niche topics for KDP
source_quotes: I will have it all right now

claims.statement: High search volume with low competition and opportunity score >5 correlates with sales success
source_quotes: if you have high s volume with low competition... sell like crazy

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific identity groups with problems and constraints for targeted niches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates underserved markets with high search volume
source_quotes: You have to Niche down the way I'm doing now
